summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the DETR object detection model's configuration, initialization, forward behavior, attention mechanisms, handling of different backbones, auxiliary loss computation, generation without explicit input IDs, processing of greyscale images, multi‑GPU data parallel execution, token embedding resizing, and gradient tracking of hidden states and attentions.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, robustness, and compatibility of the DETR model across diverse scenarios and hardware setups, supporting reliable deployment in production object‑detection pipelines.
